channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
havent been on in a while but here is my question.Ok i have a source and i wanna play with a friend offline pn my other pc is there someway that i can hook the up together and have them both play the server not connected to the internet?
Thanks for whoever helps :D

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

For this you should use Hamachi.

Read full topic

lol what you mean host it locally like no-ip?
or what

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Doggie Skill, post:2, topic:433246”]I’m no expert on doing that, and I never have.

But if it is possible I’m guessing that your friend would have to change his IP and make it the same as yours.[/quote]

Host it locally with your router IP. then just have him plug a ethernet cable into his laptop, and your router, and have him set up that as a new connection. This SHOULD work. im not 100% sure though.

Read full topic
